00027 #ifdef _WIN32
00028     // The file's constructors make heavy use of the 'this' pointer, in a safe
00029     // manner. MSVC isn't smart enough to know that it's safe.

00035 namespace detail {
00044 template <size_t Bits, class Alloc = std::allocator<digit_t>, bool Threadsafe =
00045     true, bool Secure = false>
00046 class fixed_digitmanager_t: public digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> {
00047     public:
00048     fixed_digitmanager_t() { }
00049     fixed_digitmanager_t(size_t requested_length, bool readonly = false):
00050         digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(requested_length, readonly)
00051         { }
00052     fixed_digitmanager_t(const base_digitmanager_t& copy):
00053         digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(copy) { }
00054 
00055     virtual base_digitmanager_t *new_of_type(base_digitmanager_t *copy = 0)
00056         const { if (copy != 0) return new fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc,
00057         Threadsafe, Secure>(*copy); else return new fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits,
00058         Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>; }
00059     virtual size_t fixed_length() const { return fixed; }
00060     virtual void endmod_hook(digit_t *p) { *(p + last_digit_index) &=
00061         last_digit_mask; }
00062 
00063     protected:
00064     static const size_t fixed, last_digit_index;
00065     static const digit_t last_digit_mask;
00066 };
00067 
00068 template <size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00069 const size_t fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::fixed =
00070     detail::data_t::bits_to_digits(Bits);
00071 template <size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> const size_t
00072     fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::last_digit_index =
00073     fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::fixed - 1;
00074 template <size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> const digit_t
00075     fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::last_digit_mask =
00076     (Bits % detail::bits_per_digit)
00077     ? digit_t((doubledigit_t(1) << (Bits % detail::bits_per_digit)) - 1)
00078     : detail::digit_mask;
00079 //template <size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> const digit_t
00080 //    fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::last_digit_mask =
00081 //    digit_t((doubledigit_t(1) << (Bits % detail::bits_per_digit)) - 1);
00082 } // namespace detail

00123 template <size_t Bits, class Alloc = std::allocator<detail::digit_t>, bool
00124     Threadsafe = true, bool Secure = false>
00125 class fixed_integer: public detail::fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc,
00126     Threadsafe, Secure>, public any_integer
00127 {
00128     public:
00129     typedef fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> type;
00130 
00133     fixed_integer();
00134     fixed_integer(const fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& b);
00135     fixed_integer(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(type) b): any_integer(*this,1) { _swap(b); }
00136     explicit fixed_integer(const char *str, size_t base = 10);
00137     explicit fixed_integer(const char *str, char **endptr, size_t base = 10);
00138     explicit fixed_integer(const std::string& str, size_t base = 10);
00139     explicit fixed_integer(const xint::binary_t b, size_t bits = 0);
00140     explicit fixed_integer(const any_integer& other);
00141     template <typename Type> fixed_integer(const Type n,
00142         typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type* = 0);
00143 
00144     #ifndef BOOST_XINT_DOXYGEN_IGNORE
00145 
00146     fixed_integer(const detail::data_t c): detail::fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits,
00147         Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(*c.holder()), any_integer(*this, c.length,
00148         c.negative) { data.beginendmod(); }
00149     #endif
00150

00158         BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type) c);
00159     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator=(
00160         BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(type) c) { _swap(c); return *this; }
00161     template <typename Type> fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>&
00162         operator=(const Type n) { fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
00163         Secure> nn(n); _swap(nn); return *this; }
00164

00168         *this; }

00232     void _swap(fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& s) { using
00233         std::swap; swap(data, s.data); }

00236     BOOST_XINT_COPYABLE_AND_MOVABLE(type)

00240 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00241 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::fixed_integer():
00242     any_integer(*this, 1)
00243 {
00244     // Don't need to do anything, already preinitialized to zero.
00245 }

00248 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00249 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::fixed_integer(const
00250     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& b):
00251     detail::fixed_digitmanager_t<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(
00252     *b.data.holder()), any_integer(*this, (std::min)(b.data.length,
00253     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::fixed),
00254     b.data.negative)
00255 {
00256     data.beginendmod();
00257 }

00335 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00336 template <typename Type> fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
00337     Secure>::fixed_integer(const Type n, typename
00338     boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type*): any_integer(*this, 1)
00339 {
00340     if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) data.set_signed(n);
00341     else data.set_unsigned(n);
00342 }

00344 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00345 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc,
00346     Threadsafe, Secure>::operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type) c)

00349     data.beginendmod();
00350     return *this;

00354 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00355 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc,
00356     Threadsafe, Secure>::operator-() const
00357 {
00358     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(-data);
00359     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00360 }
00361 
00367 template <size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00368 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc,
00369     Threadsafe, Secure>::operator~() const
00370 {
00371     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00372     r.data.beginmod(this->fixed_length(), true);
00373     const detail::digit_t *s = data.digits(), *se = s + data.length;
00374     detail::digit_t *t = r.data.digits(), *te = t + this->fixed_length();
00375     while (s != se) *t++ = ~(*s++);
00376     while (t != te) *t++ = static_cast<detail::digit_t>(~0);
00377     r.data.length = this->fixed_length();
00378     r.data.endmod();
00379     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00380 }

00581 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00582 template <class Type>
00583 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc,
00584     Threadsafe, Secure>::random_by_size(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, bool
00585     high_bit_on, bool low_bit_on, bool can_be_negative)
00586 {
00587     detail::random_generator<Type> rgen(gen);
00588 
00589     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00590     detail::random_by_size(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, high_bit_on,
00591         low_bit_on, can_be_negative);
00592     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00593 }

00597 template <class Type>
00598 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc,
00599     Threadsafe, Secure>::random_prime(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, callback_t
00600     callback)
00601 {
00602     detail::random_generator<Type> rgen(gen);
00603 
00604     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00605     detail::random_prime(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, callback);
00606     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00607 }

00615 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00616 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> abs(const fixed_integer<Bits,
00617     Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n)
00618 {
00619     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(abs(n._data()));
00620     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00621 }
00622 
00624 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00625 typename fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::divide_t divide(const
00626     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> dividend, const
00627     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> divisor)
00628 {
00629     typename fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::divide_t r;
00630     divide(r.quotient._data(), r.remainder._data(), dividend._data(),
00631         divisor._data());
00632     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00633 }

00736 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00737 fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> mulmod(const fixed_integer<Bits,
00738     Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n, const fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
00739     Secure> by, const fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> modulus)

00945 #define BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(rtype, op) \
00946     template <size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename \
00947         N> \
00948     rtype op(const fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const N \
00949         n2) \
00950     { \
00951         return op(n1, fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n2)); \
00952     } \
00953     \
00954     template <typename N, size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool \
00955         Secure> \
00956     rtype op(const N n1, const fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> \
00957         n2) \
00958     { \
00959         return op(fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n1), n2); \
00960     }
00961 
00962 BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<)
00963 BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>)
00964 BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<=)
00965 BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>=)
00966 BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator==)
00967 BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator!=)
00968 BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_COMPARE(int, compare)

00971 #define BOOST_XINT_FIXED_ANY_MATH(op) \
00972     template <size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename \
00973         N> \
00974     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> op(const fixed_integer<Bits,\
00975         Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const N n2) \
00976     { \
00977         fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(op(n1, \
00978             fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n2))); \
00979         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
00980     } \
00981     \
00982     template <typename N, size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool \
00983         Secure> \
00984     fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> op(const N n1, const \
00985         fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n2) \
00986     { \
00987         fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(op(fixed_integer< \
00988             Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n1), n2)); \
00989         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
00990     }

01039 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01040 class numeric_limits<boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
01041     Secure> >
01042 {
01043     public:
01044     static const bool is_specialized = true;
01045 
01046     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> min()
01047         throw() { return -~(boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
01048         Secure>()); }
01049     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> max()
01050         throw() { return ~(boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
01051         Secure>()); }
01052 
01053     static const int digits = Bits;
01054     static const int digits10;
01055     static const bool is_signed = true;
01056     static const bool is_integer = true;
01057     static const bool is_exact = true;
01058     static const int radix = 2;
01059     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> epsilon()
01060         throw() { return 0; }
01061     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
01062         round_error() throw() { return 0; }
01063 
01064     static const int min_exponent = 0; // N/A
01065     static const int min_exponent10 = 0; // N/A
01066     static const int max_exponent = 0; // N/A
01067     static const int max_exponent10 = 0; // N/A
01068 
01069     static const bool has_infinity = false;
01070     static const bool has_quiet_NaN = false;
01071     static const bool has_signaling_NaN = false;
01072     static const float_denorm_style has_denorm = denorm_absent; // N/A
01073     static const bool has_denorm_loss = false; // N/A
01074 
01075     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
01076         infinity() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
01077     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
01078         quiet_NaN() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
01079     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
01080         signaling_NaN() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
01081     static boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
01082         denorm_min() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
01083 
01084     static const bool is_iec559 = false;
01085     static const bool is_bounded = true;
01086     static const bool is_modulo = true;
01087 
01088     static const bool traps = true; // I assume this means exceptions?
01089     static const bool tinyness_before = false; // N/A
01090     static const float_round_style round_style = round_indeterminate; // N/A
01091 };

01094 template<size_t Bits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01095 const int numeric_limits<boost::xint::fixed_integer<Bits, Alloc, Threadsafe,
01096     Secure> >::digits10
01097     = static_cast<int>(boost::xint::detail::log10_bits(Bits));
